en-GB.summary: Alexa Skill which finds out the size or weight of a Star Wars figure
examplePhrases: Alexa, open star wars figures and ask for the height of Luke Skywalker
Alexa, ask star wars figures for the weight of Yoda
Alexa, ask star wars figures and ask how tall Obi-Wan Kenobi is
en-GB.name: star-wars-figures
en-GB.description: Alexa Skill which finds out the size or weight of a Star Wars figure
